modName: vwr Jump - Jump like a ninja cat if you got the skill
summary: Gives you the ability to jump onto a house from the ground, or scale enemy forts where they don\\\\\\\'t expect it.
descriptionHtml:
There is now a version that requires ONLY Skyrim. The ScriptDragon version is better and if you have the ability to compare them both, I am open to argument on that point.

Gives you a super boost jump. The height of the jump depends on how quickly your can press \\\\\\\'sneak,sneak,jump\\\\\\\'. See the video.

Installation: 
   Vanilla: Unzip to your Skyrim Data folder, activate in NMM or your launcher. Sneak-sneak-JUMP!

   Script Dragon: Make sure you have the latest version of Script Dragon. Unzip the file vwrJump.asi and save it into your Skyrim folder (not Data folder).

Usage: The plugin will display a message in the top left corner when you load your game \"vwrJump Initialized.\". Once that happens, do the following:

With your character standing, press sneak TWICE then jump, as fast as you can. Sneak, sneak, jump.

When you go from standing to sneak, a timer starts taking points away from the \'jump height\' so the longer you take to un-sneak, the less jump points you get. Then when you unsneak, another timer fires and only gives you a split second to press the jump button, otherwise you lose it and have to start all over. I did this because I both wanted it to require some skill for the full effect, and I wanted it to be somewhat controllable. Once you use it for a few minutes and play around with how long you take to press sneak the SECOND time, you\'ll realize you don\'t \'always\' have to jump 20 feet ;)

Script Dragon Version: Every time you use the jump, it will print in the console how many jump points you got. It also prints your \'normal\' jump points so do it a few times and look for the number that changes.

[youtube]iw-i0AuLxKE[/youtube]

Credits:
Wafflesalot - Scripting and Debugging help
